DOC.brief_summary: The objective study demonstrate multiple-dose efficacy safety HKT-500 treatment ankle sprain .
DOC.brief_title: HKT-500 Treatment Adult Patients With Ankle Sprain
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Multicenter , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety HKT-500 Treatment Pain Associated With Mild Moderate Ankle Sprain
DOC.criteria: mild Moderate Ankle Sprain Any woman childbearing potential positive urine pregnancy test , lactating , surgically sterile ( tubal ligation hysterectomy ) , least 2 year postmenopausal , practice acceptable form birth control ( define use intrauterine device spermicide , barrier method spermicide , condom spermicide , subdermal implant , oral contraceptive , abstinence ) least 2 month prior Visit 1 .
